title: Hold Defense
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship repels a gnoll attack
summary: Dunmar Fellowship is awakened by approaching gnolls and a bat-like demon at Raven's Hold.
Wellby kills the demon with an arrow, prompting a battle where the gnolls are slowly picked off.
Kenzo's counter moves allow the gnolls to push through the door, but the Fellowship eventually wins the battle.
One gnoll flees but is tracked down and defeated by Kenzo and Wellby, with the rest of the party joining to clear the threat.
Post-battle, the Fellowship finds starving animals in the stables and signs of previous hobgoblin occupation in the hold's buildings.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship successfully defends Raven's Hold against a gnoll incursion, later finding clues to prior occupations.
